steps.description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board
steps.modified_description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board after heating it on a pan for 1 minute

errors.description: Use tortilla after heating it on pan for 1 minute

steps.description: scoop-Use a butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar
steps.modified_description: scoop-Use a knife to scoop nut butter from the jar

errors.description: Used a knife instead of butter knife

steps.description: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla, leaving 1/2-inch uncovered at the edges
steps.modified_description: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the whole tortilla

steps.description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping it with a paper towel
scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar
Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with a paper towel
Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps, but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.modified_description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 2.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps, so that that the filling leaks

steps.description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks about 1 inch apart
Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll
steps.modified_description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with a normal knife, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll

steps.description: Slide-Slide floss under the tortilla, perpendicular to the length of the roll
Place-Place the floss halfway between toothpicks
pull-pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice
steps.modified_description: Pull-pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice but at different times

steps.description: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel

errors.description: Due to error in previous step, this won't work

steps.description: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
steps.modified_description: slicing-Continue slicing with knife to create 1 more pinwheel

steps.description: Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate

errors.description: Spread-Spread jelly over the nut butter
Cross-Cross the floss's two ends over the tortilla roll's top
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
